alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 3:25PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. .After the last precipitation event, river stages are once again on the rise along the Red River. The Red River at Fargo is expected to continue rising into the weekend, reaching a crest in the 22 to 24 ft range by April 12th or 13th. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Fargo. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, North Broadway bridge is closed (Fargo/Moorhead). * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 22.5 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
